website_summaries.verdict: Sturdy yet lightweight, this headgear trades visibility for better face protection.
pros: Hook and loop closure offers snug fit
Removable face mask lets you decide whether to show up at the office with a black eye or not
cons: Limits peripheral vision, especially if face mask is attached
Material is very stiff when new
Interior fabric lining is hard to clean and gets smelly

customer_reviews.title: WE DON'T EVEN WEAR A MOUTH GUARD!!! This is a great helmet/headgear for my almost 8-year-old
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my almost 8 year old. We went with this type of mask to protect his face as some of the other headgear does not have this much protection. We don't even use a mouth guard because his face is well protected. The product is well-made and we are very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: 🍀🍀 GREEN IRISH EYES 🍀🍀

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed! Amateur Design.
customer_reviews.text: I love RDX and have numerous of their products and let me state that they have great products, but let me just clarify that this is not one of them. This product is poorly geometrically designed, the plastic cover is not correctly aligned and obstructs the view which will result in more impact over the safety it provides, without it the view is better. The stitching is poorly made and the padding will leave you concussed really easy as you can feel absolutely no difference. This is not a proper way to create a head guard. Sorry, please do more investigating. I'd rather get hit by bare knuckles then have a swollen brain.
customer_reviews.author: Sky W

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, great price!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my Jeet Kune Do sparring as it has continued to grow more and more intense. I was amazed at how well this protects my head. I can still feel enough of the impact to not charge in blindly, while allowing me to be more aggressive. With this on I can go all out without it resulting in a busted lip, broken nose, or black eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Phong Ho

customer_reviews.title: Extremely poor peripheral vision compared to other headgear I have tried ...
customer_reviews.text: Extremely poor peripheral vision compared to other headgear I have tried - I tried a similar style with a plastic face guard like this one and a ringside with a metal cage, both have much better peripheral vision. The fit was also off for me, it didn't fit well in the front, the chin didn't touch the front of the headgear. I also agree with what a few others noted, cleaning the inside of the headgear would be difficult because it has a fabric lining. Paid shipping to return the item because it just wasn't worth keeping; I'd rather pay more for an alternative piece of gear.
customer_reviews.author: amznuser79

customer_reviews.title: Great head gear!
customer_reviews.text: This product works great. I like that it protects my eyes during sparring, as I only see out of one eye due to a recent accident where I lost the vision in my right eye. I can no longer risk taking damage to my eyes but was missing the feeling of sparring, so I was seeking a solution to making a full contact sport a bit safer for me. This head gear provides that for me. I won't complain about the obstructed peripheral since I can't see as much as I used to anyway. But all in all it is a great product. My only complaint is I wish there was some sort of chin strap.

feature_bullets: RDX Head Guard is contrived with Maya Hide Leather material that refuse to split, fray or tear. The material reassures resistance against tapping out on performance. Quick-EZ hook-and-loop strap offers a protected and adjustable fit reducing chances of head protector of slipping off. Unique Quick EZ-Strap provides steady closure while stabilizing it solidly and allowing the optimum amount of head flexion with the support of attached elastic band.

This Face protector ensure a high quality protection with face grill that ensures you stay secure against nasty cuts and blows to your face. The PVC protective grill battles high impact strikes. It further confirms your vision is not disturbed, hence you stay secure and confident during training and sparring sessions.

Our Head Guard is enormously solid and compressed EVA-Lution sheet delivers eventual impact resistance. The shock resistance sheet makes this head protector almost invincible, allowing you to dish out some major force with full conviction. It is exclusively manufactured for real tough training sessions.
